select FAQ_NUM, FAQ_CATEGORY, SUBJECT, CONTENT from ( select rownum rn, FAQ_NUM, FAQ_CATEGORY, SUBJECT, CONTENT from SERVICE_FAQ where
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ORDER BY FAQ_NUM desc ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

select count(*) from SERVICE_FAQ where
FAQ_NUM > 0

select count(*) from SERVICE_FAQ where
FAQ_NUM > 0 and faq_category = '변경/취소'

select count(*) from SERVICE_FAQ where
FAQ_NUM > 0 and faq_category = '교환/반품'

select count(*) from SERVICE_FAQ where
FAQ_NUM > 0 and faq_category = '주문/조회'

select count(*) from SERVICE_FAQ where
FAQ_NUM > 0 and faq_category = '상품문의'
